reviews.review: Ваще пиздец нахуй , блооооо

Para aquellos que son fanaticos de juegos shooter, les recomiendo que prueben el Left 4 dead porque esta buenisimo, hay armas, supuervivientes, rescates, records de supervivencia, se puede jugar una partida en modo versus, o partida cooperativa de 10, por si no me creen vean  imagenes  y/o gameplays!

By: Maxi (primito de Angel-Pumper)
The game that started it all.
>L4D2

In one of my previous reviews, I've explained how exciting the sequel, L4D2, was an amazing game.  The first one introduces some of the many key aspects you would find in the sequel, and shows much Valve left out during the time.  Although there is not much to try out, L4D is still a great challenge, and I recommend that you give this one a try anyway.

this was my all time favorite game on the 360 before it broke (for the second time!!1!!1) multi-player was so good i would come home from school and play till 5, eat, homework, then play till midnight everyday!  i remmember the best time i had was on a friday i joined a server where everybody had a mic and i could tell they were all friends from college or something.  everyone sopke and we stayed up till 4 just playing verses. NOT TODAY... L4D now is a bunch of fucks who Play "professionaly"
if at all. servers are dead and all support has gone to the sequal. you have to wade through all the dick to find the people who just want to play.  its nice that they transfered all the content over from L4D to the sequal but the gaem is nowwhere near the level of perfection it was back 2007!
Пока единственная из известных мне игр, в которой не возможно "затащить" PvP в одиночку(против "средних" противников). При том, что стать "средним" игроком можно достаточно быстро.
Zombie genocide!
A classic to own on your account. A simple must have.
Amazing game, great to play with friends!
this game was fun once; everybody moved on tho.  just like in real life
Best game I've ever played. Not really a story line, but fun to play with friends and to destroy your enemys :D

Fun to be had. I love the themes and stylings of this game. Embracing the B-movie niche of zombie titles and bringing friends along to boot. 

And if you want the most frustrating experience of your life, try the online multiplayer! Teamwork never seemed so far away.

Yet again, VALVe have created another spectacular and rather unique game. Unlike most conventional zombie games, featuring the old 'shuffling corpses', Left 4 Dead features fast and scary zombies and also throws several special infected into the mix. This is a very fun game, and with the A.I Director randomizing elements of the game every time you play, there is no predicting what you're going to face and where. If you are any sort of zombie fan, you should get this game!

Eis um excelente título para jogar com os seus amigos pois este jogo é pensado quase exclusivamente para ser jogado cooperativamente. Junte-se com 3 dos seus melhores amigos e divirta-se nessa tensa atmosfera apocalíptica.
2편을 하는 편이 좋다.
ИГРА ОЧЕНЬ ИНТЕРЕСНАЯ И Я ЛЮБЛЮ В НЕЕ ИГРАТЬ НО ЖАЛЬ ЧТО К ЭТОМУ ВРЕМЕНИ ПОЧТИ ВСЕ ЗАБЫЛИ 1 ЛЕФТ ФО ДЕД
Got 3 friends and a hunger for zombie gibs? This is the game for you!

I personally play more often this one than its sequel even despite L4D2 having the campaigns of L4D1 because of the insane details that this game has, the reload animations, idle animations of the characters, you can see your feet, everything can be shot (TVs, tables, books on shelves...), The ragdolls when you die, even the way they hold their guns while crouched or standing is much better. I was even playing No Mercy and at one point in the subway section I was next to a water pipe and you could hear the water pressure inside. I literally found about this recently and I couldn't believe they would have added such a small detail for a 2008 game. Just goes to show that games like this one are not made anymore.
Not to mention the fact that there are much friendlier people who take the game seriously because of the small amount of players remaining. I've met many great players with who I've had lots of fun.
Oh man, this game is just way too much fun.

Одна из лучших игр для совместной игры. неверьте тем кто говорит что карт маловато. Стандартных карт хвататит надолго. Графически выглядит очень круто, даже сейчас.
Так же можно разнообразить игру режимом выживание.
Собственно что говорить картинка говорит сама за себя.

Left 4 Dead
御薦め:★★★★☆☆☆☆☆☆　クリア：済

　ホラー風味大人気共闘型FPSの第一弾。
　感染者と呼ばれる敵を押しのけて仲間と共に脱出する事を目的としている。
　キャンペーン毎にキャプチャーが細かく分かれており、
　自由にシナリオの開始地点や難易度を選びで色々な楽しみ方が出来る。
　
　度々出てくる特殊感染者に捕まると、仲間の協力がないと助からない。
　また、タンクやウィッチなど強敵に対して共闘する楽しみを見いだせる。
　見事なゲームバランスで一人で押し進められない様にできている。

　『Left 4 Dead 2』で『Left 4 Dead』のキャンペーンが補完されているので
　素直に『Left 4 Dead 2』を購入すればこちらのシナリオも遊べる。

I really recommend buying this game its really fun. :)

A must have for zombie fans!
Have over 7000 hours of game play, and still  be bad at this game like some people. ahahaha.!  HELL YEAH M2 NUB.!
Don't Play This Game. Because Chances Are, You Cant.
This game has everything, there is nothing to not like. get it.
Killing zombies has never been more pleasurable. Except in Left 4 Dead 2 >_> Get this game or so help me I will crawl down your throat and lay eggs.

One of the best zombie shooters I've ever played, well worth the price tag I think anyone that has Steam has to try this game, the playerbase isn't as high as its sequel L4D2, but this game still holds its own, not to mention the awesome modding community this and the sequel has.
it is relly goood
Uma obra-prima dos games de zumbis,este é obrigatório para quem curte FPS...

Before playing this game you should get "left4uncut" (works on both L4d1 and 2). I hate nurfed games. But, this zombie shooter has good solid gameplay, and lots of those "Hell yeah, we kick ass!" moments if you find a good team to play with. Friendly Fire from the AI players can be annoying, but certainly doesn't spoil the fun. Stick together with your team to get the most out of this, as on your own it's easy to get picked off. Oh, and don't disturb the Witch!
Класс! Очень нравится.
Great Co-op Game!
This is the best zombie survivor game I've ever played since Land of the Dead: Road to Fiddler's Green.

The best zombie shooter game ever made! 
Magnificent maps,many varieties of zombies,4 cool playable characters (Bill,Zoey,Louis,Franciss) and beatiful music.
These are only of the few reasons why this game is amazing.
Ah, good ol' L4D1.  All of my comments regarding L4D2 apply here so read that recommendation instead.

Год назад Valve в очередной раз доказала свою гениальность, практически без предупреждений выпустив игру, которая перевернула наши представления о жанре зомби-экшенов. До этого за игры со стрельбой по зомби обычно брались студии второго эшелона, которые уверенно выдавали на гора ничем не выдающийся трэш. А вот Left 4 Dead оказался проектом совсем другого уровня. Да что там – в Valve создали не только лучший в мире зомби-шутер, но и отличный командный экшен с очень оригинальной концепцией.

So you and 3 buddies get to go kill zombies! 
Gotta work together or else every dies, the game knows this, and will kill you if you don't help each other out. Set pieces are interesting, enviornments are fun to navigate, and gameplay is tight and enjoyable. 

Best enjoyed with friends and beer.
Если у вас есть 4 друга и скайп то эта игра никогда не будет для вас скучной!
Muito bom, tenso, divertido. Um dos melhores jogos "on line" da história dos games!
Left 4 Dead is a love letter to zombie fans. It has some well designed levels, powerful weapons, fun online coop and much more. If you love killing tons and tons of zombies, this is the game for you.
Perfect game for zombie lovers. 5/5 !
If you don't already have this: you should. It's a must have for LAN parties.
Epic zombie killing fun!

If you love shooting armies of zombies while Fighting for you life against super zombies (aka the super infected). Not knowing when you or your team mates will become noting more then a snack food. seeing blood guts flying in the air as every bullets that comes from your guns hit the hungry dead while tearing them to bits then this game is for you. zombie killing greatness
Original zombie, Co-Op, CS style shooter that is simple and fun. AI is still smarter then Human players.
This is one of the best games of all time.
nice games... good for releasing stress...

Although Left 4 Dead 2 is more popular, and almost all maps are ported, the gameplay and atmosphere is still better in the original Left 4 Dead. Francis is still my favourite.

My score: 10/10 (Must buy!)
I like shooting zombies in the face.
You and some friends like zombie shooters? Then why are you not playing this?!
How could you go wrong with slaying hordes of zombies non stop?!!!

Albeit dwarved by its successor, this game still presents anyone with the thrill of decapitation and utter destruction (for good practice?), and outweighs most games of its generation. Worthy of being an icon of the past decade, with graphics that astound some of the more recent games. A small downside is its reliance on multiplayer gaming online, as a single player storyline is offered without real achievement, compared to the 'campaign mode'. Nevertheless, a good buy, with subtle differences from L4D2.

Why this game is awesome, the rushing feel as the zombies numbers can take their toll if not killed quickly, and the tank, so hard to kill, teamwork is a key factor in this game, it's what makes it awesome of course.
One of the best games ever!!!!!!

I put in a good 100 hours into this game.  Awesome COOP and gritty action!

4 people banding together to fight off hordes of undead where only team work will allow you to live!  You have to share, watch ammo, and move in sync.

Overall though, it is a travel from point A to Point B and you win, with the exception of some areas you need to defend.

Quite a bit more difficult than l4d2 and also darker.  I put more hours into L4D2 because it was more popular, but I honestly enjoyed this one much more!

A belligerent and unlettered malcontent accused me of writing too many negative reviews which he was apparently being forced to read, or something. Well anyway, here comes a positive one... 

This is my favourite computer game of all time. Valve have succeeded at the impossible; taking random strangers on the Internet and turning them into friends and respected comrades via cooperative, team-focussed gameplay set in an engaging series of post-apocalyptic, zombie infested locales. Self-sacrifice and team-spirit abound and good will flows freely (at least it did in 2009) as you and three soon-to-be-friends save each-other’s butts and bandage each-other’s wounds. No game has done more to raise the overall tone of online gaming than L4D. Pass the shells and ‘stay down in front!’

Just as good as L4D2. It's lacking a few features of the 2nd one, but all in all it's the exact same game, great production, great voice acting, fun all around game with a story worthy of any fan of John A. Romero.

[h1]Summary[/h1]

Left 4 Dead is the first game I bought on Steam and I had a blast playing it even over my terrible internet.

Now days you might as well buy Left 4 Dead 2 because the original content was ported over.

Being serious now: This is a great game to play with others on your friends list. Although to be honest, the bots are fucking retarded and heavily depend on you to do shit. It's boring with bots and jackasses/people who take this game seriously. This game HEAVILY relies on teamwork in order for you and the others to survive, or else you will DIE!

As far as Zombie games go it could have portrayed them more as the flesh eaters they truly are. Aside from that, this is one of the best Horror/Survival games around. The realism is in your face and over the top. Much like watching 'Dawn Of The Dead', except your in it!

The original action zombie shooter. Such an amazing title... the original atmosphere still beats a lot of what is found in the more cartoonish Left 4 Dead 2. This is crazy value if you can get this game for cheap.

Отличная сетевая игра:) Каждый из четырех выживших по-своему уникален и интересен, но я полюбила играть за Зои:) Игра хороша только для совместного прохождения с разными игроками, как одиночная она не катит... Атмосфера, музыкальное сопровождение, доля юмора, интересные диалоги персонажей и редкие, но красочные ролики очень хороши и достойны похвал:) В Left4Dead можно играть довольно долго, проходя все кампании сначала на среднем уровне, потом на мастере и, если кишка не тонка, на эксперте;))

One of the best co-op games ive played. Great fun, decent graphics and good support with all kinds of different enemies and campaigns to make gameplay more diverse and interesting. Also has versus mode which allows for 8 people, and 2 teams of 4, 1 as survivors and 1 as infected. However, ever since the Left 4 Dead 2 came out the servers are a bit quiet, better off buying the sequel.

This is a really good game it is worth it.
